text: Beyond the Garden () is a 1996 Spanish drama film directed by Pedro Olea. == Cast == * Concha Velasco - Palmira * Fernando Guillén - Willy * Manuel Bandera - Tario * Andrea Occhipinti - Ugo * Ingrid Rubio - Helena * - Alex * Martirio - Mencia * Mary Carrillo - Ama * Claudia Gravy - Doctora Dubois * - Isa Bustos * Giancarlo Giannini - Bernardo * Goya Toledo - Teresa * María Galiana - Ramona * Germán Cobos - Alvaro Larra == References == == External links == * Category:1996 drama films Category:1996 films Category:Spanish films Category:Spanish drama films
title: Beyond the Garden
